entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 9.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
